<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shadow Self](/Feats.aspx?ID=4473) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Halfling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=87" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 61 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Prerequisites**
Legendary in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15)

**Trigger**
You successfully use Stealth to Hide and become hidden from all your current foes, or use Stealth to Sneak and become undetected to all your current foes

</column>

---

You slip from your adversaries' notice and appear to be somewhere else. You become [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26) for 1 minute or until you take a hostile action, whichever comes first. Choose a location within 10 feet of you. Until your invisibility ends, you appear to be [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) in that location to anyone trying to find you. If the searcher gets clear evidence that you're not there, they no longer think you're hidden there, but they don't discover your actual location.
name: Shadow Self
